blogs.name: yasirmx
blogs.description: The main things I write about are technology, photography, mauritius and media

blogs.name: HACKLOG
blogs.description: HACKLOG is all about my love story with computers & Linux. It is my Internet space where I publish stuffs spinning in my mind. It is my hack log. I write about things I break & I repair.

blogs.name: Irshaad's World
blogs.description: I am from Mauritius and student in Information Systems Engineering in Turkey.  Social, geeky, tech-lover and everything that's linked to technology; am in it. Not exactly 'Jack of all trade' but I like to try and test each and everything I come across. My blog will surely show that better.

blogs.name: Suraj Motee
blogs.description: Hi, I am Suraj Motee. I welcome you with an open heart to my blog. I am a simple guy from Mauritius. I am always busy struggling to fulfill my dreams. I believe in my potential to become a good teacher one day.

blogs.name: Tunellix
blogs.description: My name is Jaykishan Mutkawoa or simply Nitin. This blog is simply about my passion for Linux and Open source softwares though sometimes, i feel to blog about Space explorations or stuffs i came across that i find interesting. I have been participating in Open source and Linux meet ups since years back. I am currently working as a Linux and Applications system administrator at Linkbynet Indian Ocean. I live in Mauritius, a little island in the Indian Ocean sadly with just 1Mbps internet speed.
